data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Middlesbrough with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway. Bristol City with the kick-off.
Tomas Kalas is on a sub for Alfie Mawson for Bristol City.
Dean Holden (Bristol City) is making a second substitution, with Famara Diedhiou replacing Chris Martin.
In the minute 70, Bristol City make their third substitution with Antoine Semenyo replacing Nahki Wells.
Goal! George Saville gives Middlesbrough a 0-1 lead.
Marcus Tavernier is replacing Djed Spence for the away team.
In the minute 77, The away team replace Patrick Roberts with Marcus Browne.
Tim Robinson blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
The away team have replaced Chuba Akpom with Nathan Wood-Gordon. This is the third substitution made today by Neil Warnock.
